tool_description: Checks the current stock and the fruit values
name: Blox Fruit Stock/Fruit
title: Blox Fruit Stock/Fruit

api_list.name: Blox Fruit Stocks
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blox-fruit-stock-fruit.p.rapidapi.com/check_stock"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blox-fruit-stock-fruit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blox-fruit-stock-fruit.p.rapidapi.com/check_stock"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blox-fruit-stock-fruit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
